data.name: Last Hour
data.detailed_description:
It starts with a relaxed cruise. But it doesn't take long for the expected misfortune to happen.
In the middle of your sleep, you will be awakened by the screams of the dying guests on the ship.
You quickly realize that you will not survive if you just stare into the flames and jump overboard.
Unfortunately, you don't stay conscious for long. A short time later you wake up on the beach of a deserted island.
You quickly realize that you are the last survivor of this debacle. But are you really the ONLYONE?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X 8-Core Prozessor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 570 series
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Keine Anmerkungen

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X 8-Core Prozessor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 570 series
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: keine Anmerkungen
